audio_description: Today we're going to make Bombay Biryani using homemade spices. So let's see how easily we can make it at home. Let's move!

audio_description: First, let's look at the spices. For the dry whole spices, we have taken 30 bay leaves. 2-3 star anise. 2 teaspoons of cloves. 2 teaspoons of black peppercorns. 1 tablespoon of cumin seeds.
